lines.text: DUMMY
let n be a integer
read n
for i = 1 to n / 2 + 1 inclusive
let numD be a integer with numD = 2 * i - 1
let numStar be a integer with numStar = n - numD
for j = 0 to numStar / 2 exclusive , print *
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < numStar / 2 ; j ++ ) { cout << " * " ; }

lines.text: for j = 0 to numD exclusive , print D
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < numD ; j ++ ) { cout << " D " ; }

lines.text: for j = 0 to numStar / 2 exclusive , print *
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < numStar / 2 ; j ++ ) { cout << " * " ; }

lines.text: print newline
DUMMY
for integer i is equal to n - 2 , i > = 1 , decrement i by 2
lines.code: for ( int i = n - 2 ; i >= 1 ; i = i - 2 )

lines.text: let numD be a integer with numD = i
let numStar be a integer with numStar = n - numD
for j = 0 to numStar / 2 exclusive , print *
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < numStar / 2 ; j ++ ) { cout << " * " ; }

lines.text: for j = 0 to numD exclusive , print D
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < numD ; j ++ ) { cout << " D " ; }

lines.text: for j = 0 to numStar / 2 exclusive , print *

lines.text: print newline
